EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Reimagine_Enterprise_Software_Q214.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Webinar: Reimagine Enterprise Software with Cloud Foundry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
'Time-to-Value' is now the career defining metric for enterprise CIOs. The velocity of IT capability delivery must match the rapid pace at which modern business cycles and consumer demand patterns change.In this live webinar <http://www.gopivotal.com/platform-as-a-service/webinar/reimagine-enterprise-software-with-cloud-foundry>, Warner Music SVP of Engineering, Dave McCrory will discuss a radical approach to the industrialization of enterprise IT and their use of next-generation cloud based Platform as a Service, Cloud Foundry.
Joining Dave, will be James Watters, Head of Product, Cloud Foundry at Pivotal. James will demo Pivotal's new solution, Pivotal CF, based on Cloud Foundry. Pivotal CF enables enterprises to empower agile development teams to rapidly update and scale applications across public or private clouds.
Lastly, Forrester's John R. Rymer, VP and Analyst serving Application Development, will add his insight to the conversation, letting us know where this important IT trend is taking us and it's impact on enterprise computing now and forever.
By attending this event <http://www.gopivotal.com/platform-as-a-service/webinar/reimagine-enterprise-software-with-cloud-foundry>your company will be eligible for a complimentary technical briefing, giving you the opportunity to dig deeper into the Pivotal CF platform and engage with Pivotal's expert engineering team.
REGISTER >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/platform-as-a-service/webinar/reimagine-enterprise-software-with-cloud-foundry> REIMAGINE ENTERPRISE SOFTWARE WITH CLOUD FOUNDRY THURSDAY APRIL 17, 2014 9:00AM PDT REGISTER <http://www.gopivotal.com/platform-as-a-service/webinar/reimagine-enterprise-software-with-cloud-foundry>
